short_summary: RCMP building located at 2881 Nanaimo Street, Victoria, BC requires a contractor to replace their HVAC system.
description: Tender for the replacement of the HVAC system at the RCMP building located in Victoria, BC.
full_summary:
[ TENDER NOTICE ] 
#### Replacement of HVAC System for RCMP Building in Victoria, BC

**Solicitation No.** : WS3773769890-3782805738
**Publication Date**: 2022-12-08
**Tender Closing Date**: 2022-12-23T14:00:00
**Contract Value**: to be determined

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a contractor to replace the Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning (HVAC) system at its building located at 2881 Nanaimo Street, Victoria, BC.

**Specifications**:

* The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price
* The selected contractor must meet all Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) requirements
* The contractor will be required to replace the existing HVAC system in its entirety

**Eligibility Requirements**:

* Contractors must be registered in the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Contractors must have a minimum of three (3) years of experience in designing, installing, and maintaining HVAC systems

**Contact Information**:

* Brandie Klyne, Contracting Authority
* Email: [brandie.klyne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:brandie.klyne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: Not Available
* Fax: Not Available

**Documentation**:

* All tender documents can be downloaded from [Ariba Discovery](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14849526?extsite=MTQ4NDk1MjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
* Please note that login credentials are required to access the document.

**Timeline**:

* Contract Start Date: 2023-01-20
* Contract End Date: 2025-03-31

The selected contractor is expected to work closely with the RCMP to ensure a successful implementation of the new HVAC system. 

Note: All terms and conditions of this tender will be governed by the standard Government of Canada - Public Contracts Regulations. It is the responsibility of the tenderer to ensure they are familiar with these regulations prior to submitting their bid.
